berlin
Class Server

java.lang.Object
  berlin.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
berlin.utils.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements berlin.utils.ActionListener

The server. This is the main object of this API. It glues together your AI and a homemade HTTP server. It creates, plays and destroys games of Berlin.

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new server.
